text: p-xylene, also known as para-xylene or by the systematic name 1,4-dimethylbenzene, is a chemical compound with the formula . It is one of three positional isomers (chemicals with the same formula and functional groups, but arranged differently) of xylene, and the most important of them for the chemical industry. == References == category:Hydrocarbons Category:Aromatic compounds
title: P-xylene
